item.description:
After our students finish their final exams, it's time for the Tufts faculty and staff to answer some questions of our own. We'll be gathering at Orleans around 7PM for drinks and to form trivia teams. The contest begins around 8PM. Please feel free to bring any of your Tufts friends (or non-Tufts trivia-geeks) as the contest is open to the general public.

Orleans will probably be showing the Red Sox-Twins game on their many high-definition TVs throughout the restaurant to keep us entertained in between rounds of trivia and drinks.

So come-on Jumbos, let's represent.
item.how_to_find_us: I will hopefully remember to bring Jumbo and so I will more than likely be the only person in attendance who is carrying a little foam elephant.
item.name: Trivia & Drinks at Orleans
